short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables input fields and JavaScript on insecure websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disables input form fields, JavaScript and Plugins on insecure websites (http:// URLs).

It also adds a button that tries upgrading the website to secure mode, which would enable full functionality again.

Best used with the Https Everywhere extension:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/https-everywhere/gcbommkclmclpchllfjekcdonpmejbdp?hl=en

New in 1.1.0:
 - Context menu to upgrade to https
 - Context menu to re-enable inputs on a http page
